title: Best of the Program | Guest: Jon Miller | 1/16/20
description:
Glenn recalls a time when "character" actually mattered and runs through the history of impeachment, from Andrew Johnson’s actual racism to how the Senate can’t speak until the trial is over. Meanwhile, Virginians are standing up strong for their Second Amendment rights. Governor “Blackface” Northam declared a state of emergency and banned guns from a pro-Second Amendment rally – because Antifa threatened violence. BlazeTV’s Jon Miller joins to weigh in on the insanity. And Glenn hears directly from Virginians who are fear a total power grab is coming.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
